name: nativescript-background-geolocation-lt
description: Sophisticated, battery-conscious, cross-platform background-geolocation with motion-detection and geofencing

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns platform add android && tns run android
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test android
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-background-geolocation-lt && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i && tns platform add android && tns platform add ios && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.ci.tslint: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-background-geolocation-lt && cd ../src
